Name: Piper's Namecard
Desc: Get by unlocking Piper's Mindscape: Truck Expert
Desc2:

The steadiest of hands whose delivery routes traverse the Hollows and the Outer Ring. Contact them for any long-distance deliveries â€” but please note, safety of fragile items cannot be guaranteed.
